text: as president Trump comes here to the
Lone Star State of Texas he landed in
Corpus Christi within the past couple of
hours and right now he is being briefed
on the situation in Corpus Christi which
was one of the first places in Texas the
hurricane Harvey made landfall he's here
to see for himself exactly what's going
on and to ask the difficult questions
about whether the kind of relief that's
being provided is exactly what people on
the ground need now here's what the
president had to say shortly after
landing in Corpus Christi wanna be
looked at in five years in ten years
from now as this is the way to do it
this was of epic abortion nobody's ever
seen anything like this I just want to
say that working with the governor and
his entire team has been an honor for us
so governor again thank you very much
and we won't say congratulations we
don't want to do that
will congratulate each other when the
call finish but you have been
